metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2553 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 3.1.x before 3.1.21, 3.2.x before 3.2.16, and 3.3.x before 3.3.6 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors related to dynamic fields.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-2553` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 3.3.6-1
otrs2 - 3.3.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.6-1').
